attributes.action: Act against homelessness in London and bring about a change.
attributes.additional_details: Video link for more information about our campaign:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rZpn-SRwEhk
attributes.background: We are representatives of Enfield Grammar School aiming to tackle homelessness in London and bring about a change which will not have an immense impact on society.

rejection.details:
Tackling homelessness in London is the responsibility of the London Assembly and local councils.

You can find out about the London Assembly's work on homelessness here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/priorities/housing-land/tackling-homelessness-overcrowding/rough-sleeping

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
